node.title: BoKnit - Wednesday Knitting Club #4
node.description:
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/bo.knit/
Ko-fi - https://ko-fi.com/boknit

Ravelry Designs - https://www.ravelry.com/designers/carolina-frias
Ravelry Group - https://www.ravelry.com/groups/mundo-boknit
Ravelry Projects - https://www.ravelry.com/projects/CarolinaFrias

#tricot #podcast #podcasttricot #knitting #knittingpodcast #worldwideknitting 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

FINISHED OBJECTS:
* Top À Babugem | Natércia Custódio - https://www.ravelry.com/patterns/library/a-babugem
* Emilinda Aurora | Fabi - https://www.ravelry.com/patterns/library/emilinda-aurora
* Xaile Doudou | Marta Mortágua - https://www.ravelry.com/patterns/library/xaile-doudou
* Serrana Playsuit | Agasalhos e Bugalhos - TEST KNIT 

WORKS IN PROGRESS:
* T-shirt Ju | Maria G Knits - https://www.ravelry.com/patterns/library/ju-tshirt

YARNS:
* Soft Cotton | Limol - https://www.limol.pt/produtos-tricot-soft-cotton
* Coast | Retrosaria Rosa Pomar - https://retrosaria.rosapomar.com/products/coast
* Sock | YarnAdventures - Descontinuado
* Intemporal | Tricots Brancal - https://www.tricotsbrancal.pt/produto/intemporal/
* Corridinho | Rosários 4 - https://rosarios4.com/montra/corridinho-novo/
* Silky | Pontinhos ao Vento - https://www.pontinhosaovento.com/category/silky

PROJECT BAGS:
* Maria Martins Knit | Etsy Shop - https://www.etsy.com/shop/MariaMartinsKnit?ref=usf_2020

|| Yarn Sub || https://yarnsub.com

(Recorded July 10, 2023)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Music: https://www.bensound.com/
